title: Textile, a. 1952, b. 1902
medium:
Medium: a. rayon and cotton; b. silk and cotton
Technique: warp faced plain weave.
inscribed: accompanying note states that it was this type of fabric - but not this color - used in the Blue Room 1902-1952.
dimensions: a. Warp: 64cm (25 1/4in.). Weft(right selv. only): 65.5cm (25 3/4in.). b. Warp: 14.5cm (5 3/4in.). Weft(one selv. only): 51cm (20 1/4in.).
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Blue heavily ribbed fabric. a: 1952 Schumacher version of a 1902 Schumacher fabric originally used in the Blue Room of the White House.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, a. 1952, b. 1902.
a. 1952, b. 1902. Medium: a. rayon and cotton; b. silk and cotton
Technique: warp faced plain weave.. Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever. 1979-9-11-a,b.
